Huffman coding is a data compression algorithm.
huffman codes  are 
h ->111110
f ->11110
i ->1110
t ->11011
l ->110100
o ->1100
n ->1011
r ->10101
d ->0010
g ->0001
H ->00001
u ->00000
c ->0011
a ->010
e ->110101
  ->011
m ->1000
. ->111111
s ->1001
p ->10100
original string ->Huffman coding is a data compression algorithm.
encoded string is ->00001000001111011110100001010110110011110000101110101100010111110100101101001100100101101101001100111100100010100101011101011001100111101100101101101011010000011100101011110110111111101000111111
the decoded string is
Huffman coding is a data compression algorithm.
